'''Phantomeow''' is [[Lynette]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Lynette wears a short dark blue and black cape over her right shoulder attached to her clothes with a teal bow in front. She wears white cuff sleeves over a black lace leotard attached to a short black ruffled skirt with dark teal at the ends. Lynette also wears black gloves, black translucent tights, and black boots with a singular black-garter at the left side of her left ankle. Her hair is tied with a large dark teal-checkered design bow with her {{Ousia}}-aligned {{Anemo}} [[Vision]] being in the middle of the bow.
